summary: You can change color of your Scarlet Dawn Armor right in game
descriptionHtml:
[color=red]This mod requires [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50814/?]Scarlet Dawn Armor[/url] mod.[/color]

After install you'll be able to change color of your Scarlet Dawn Armor right in game.
1)Craft white version of armor("leather" section at any forge)
2)If you want to change color, craft paint bottle("misc" section at any forge) and repaint your armor.
Available: red, blue, black, green, dark red and white versions

Update:
1.1 - White armor with red sash added, fixed invisible shawls and armor color bug. Now you can choose unp/unpb/cbbe/cbpe version.

How to install:
At first you need to choose your version of body replacer(CBBE/UNP/etc) [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50814/?]HERE[/url] and install.
Then install this mod.

[color=red]Notes:[/color]
-1.1 version has been tested with UNP, CBBE, CBPE.
-7base meshes is incompatible for now, maybe it will be fixed later.
-If someone can test UNPB-BBP version, it will be great, because I can't test it(it seems BBP requires some mod that I don't have and I have CTD with this meshes).
-About clipping issues: this mod doesn't change any armor meshes, only textures. Probably it's because of original files(jmenaru has warned about this on his mod page).
-[color=red]If it's not difficult, please tell me with which replacers it works well or bad.[/color]

Credits:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2509011/?]jmenaru[/url] - author of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50814/?]Scarlet Dawn Armor[/url] mod
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5622372/?]Kitananji[/url] - Blue retexture
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4459150/?]Mythos214[/url] - Green and white retexture
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/7285180/?]MallowsofInferno[/url] - Mythic dawn retexture
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8320654/?]istoleyourface[/url] - just passing through
raisuli2013, m14aria - thanks for screenshots
author: jmenaru and istoleyourface
